ShootingDelay.description: How long this object waits before shooting again.

InitialDelay.description: How long the object waits before starting the normal active/inactive cycle.

ShotAngleMin.description: The minimum angle this object can shoot at.

ShotAngleMax.description: The maximum angle this object can shoot at.

ShotSpeed.description: How fast the shot missiles travel.

ShotTime.description: How long this object takes to shoot a missile.

MissileAccelTime.description: How long the shot missiles take to reach their maximum speed.

MissileHomingWait.description: How long the missiles wait before homing in on their target.

MissileHomingRotation.description: The speed of the missiles when they start spinning in the air after launch.

IsEventDriven.description: Whether this object is active by default or must be triggered by something first.
